languages.text: "Очень удобно. Исчезнувший часовой, отсутствующая вопреки уставу инфопластина". {n}Хротко барабанит пальцами по своей, расположившейся в кобуре на поясе.{/n}
"Very convenient. A missing sentry, a data-slate misplaced against regulations." {n}Hrotko drums his fingers on a holster on his belt, where his own data-slate sits tightly nestled.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Очень удобно. Исчезнувший часовой, отсутствующая вопреки уставу инфопластина". {n}Хротко барабанит пальцами по своей, расположившейся в кобуре на поясе.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Very convenient. A missing sentry, a data-slate misplaced against regulations." {n}Hrotko drums fingers on his own data-slate, nestled cosily in a belt holster.{/n}
"Interrogating the technomats. They told me nothing of substance, so I saw no need to report it to anyone."
"Very convenient. A missing sentry, a data-slate misplaced against regulations." {n}Hrotko drums his fingers on a holster on his belt, where his own data-slate sits tightly nestled.{/n}
"Very convenient. A missing sentry, a data-slate misplaced against regulations." {n}Hrotko drums his fingers on a holster on his belt, where his own data-slate sits tightly nestled.{/n}

"Very convenient. A missing sentry, a data-slate misplaced against regulations." {n}Hrotko drums his fingers on a holster on his belt, where his own data-slate sits tightly nestled.{/n}
"Very convenient. A missing sentry, a data-slate misplaced against regulations." {n}Hrotko drums his fingers on a holster on his belt, where his own data-slate sits tightly nestled.{/n}

languages.text: « Comme c'est pratique. Une sentinelle qui manque à l'appel, une plaque de données oubliée en un lieu contraire au règlement. » {n}Hrotko tambourine du bout des doigts sur l'étui accroché à sa ceinture, dans lequel sa propre plaque de données est dûment rangée.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Very convenient. A missing sentry, a data-slate misplaced against regulations." {n}Hrotko drums his fingers on a holster on his belt, where his own data-slate sits tightly nestled.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Comme c'est pratique. Une sentinelle qui manque à l'appel, une plaque de données oubliée en un lieu contraire au règlement. » {n}Hrotko tambourine du bout des doigts sur l'étui accroché à sa ceinture, dans lequel sa propre plaque de données est dûment rangée.{/n}
« Je voulais interroger les technomates. Mais comme ils ne m'ont rien révélé d'intéressant, je n'ai pas jugé nécessaire d'en informer qui que ce soit. »

languages.text: «Todo muy conveniente. Un vigilante desaparecido y una tablilla de datos extraviada en contra de lo que dicta el reglamento». {n}Hrotko tamborilea con los dedos en la pistolera de su cinturón, donde guarda su propia tablilla de datos.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Very convenient. A missing sentry, a data-slate misplaced against regulations." {n}Hrotko drums his fingers on a holster on his belt, where his own data-slate sits tightly nestled.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Todo muy conveniente. Un vigilante desaparecido y una tablilla de datos extraviada en contra de lo que dicta el reglamento». {n}Hrotko tamborilea con los dedos en la pistolera de su cinturón, donde guarda su propia tablilla de datos.{/n}
«Interrogar a los tecnómatas. No me dijeron nada relevante, por lo que no vi la necesidad de informar a nadie».

languages.text: “这理由还真省事。先是看守不见了，然后又是数据板放在了不该放的地方。”{n}赫洛卡用指节敲着自己腰带上的皮套，他自己的数据板妥善地存放在皮套里。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Very convenient. A missing sentry, a data-slate misplaced against regulations." {n}Hrotko drums his fingers on a holster on his belt, where his own data-slate sits tightly nestled.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这理由还真省事。先是看守不见了，然后又是数据板放在了不该放的地方。”{n}赫洛卡用指节敲着自己腰带上的皮套，他自己的数据板妥善地存放在皮套里。{/n}
“我当时在审问技工。他们并没有告诉我任何重要的事情，所以我认为没必要向其他人报告。”

languages.text: 「実に都合のいい話だ。消えた警備兵、規則に反して置き忘れたデータスレート」{n}フロトコはベルトのホルスターを指で叩き、自分のデータスレートがしっかりと収まっているのを確認した。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Very convenient. A missing sentry, a data-slate misplaced against regulations." {n}Hrotko drums his fingers on a holster on his belt, where his own data-slate sits tightly nestled.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「実に都合のいい話だ。消えた警備兵、規則に反して置き忘れたデータスレート」{n}フロトコはベルトのホルスターを指で叩き、自分のデータスレートがしっかりと収まっているのを確認した。{/n}
「テクノマットの尋問です。彼らは意味のある情報は何も言わなかったので、報告する必要はないと思ったんです」

languages.text: "Sehr praktisch. Ein vermisster Wachmann, ein unsachgemäß abgelegter Datenblock." {n}Hrotko trommelt mit seinen Fingern auf das Halfter an seinem Gürtel, an dem sein eigener Datenblock befestigt ist.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Very convenient. A missing sentry, a data-slate misplaced against regulations." {n}Hrotko drums his fingers on a holster on his belt, where his own data-slate sits tightly nestled.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Sehr praktisch. Ein vermisster Wachmann, ein unsachgemäß abgelegter Datenblock." {n}Hrotko trommelt mit seinen Fingern auf das Halfter an seinem Gürtel, an dem sein eigener Datenblock befestigt ist.{/n}
"Die Technomaten verhört. Sie hatten nichts Wichtiges zu sagen, daher sah ich keine Notwendigkeit, jemandem davon zu berichten."

languages.text: "Durum çok müsaitmiş. Gözcü kayıp, databela da mevzuata rağmen yerinde değil." {n}Hrotko, databelasını sıkıca yerleştirdiği kemerindeki kılıfın üzerinde parmaklarını tıkırdatıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Very convenient. A missing sentry, a data-slate misplaced against regulations." {n}Hrotko drums his fingers on a holster on his belt, where his own data-slate sits tightly nestled.{/n}
